HeadComp.title: MessageBird vs MSG91 | WhatsApp Business API Comparison
HeadComp.description: Compare MessageBird and MSG91 for WhatsApp Business API solutions. See how they differ in WhatsApp pricing, automation, template management, integrations, and support to choose the best WhatsApp platform for your business.

CompareBannerComp.heading: MSG91 vs MessageBird
CompareBannerComp.subheading: MessageBird (now Bird) and MSG91 both offer robust WhatsApp and omnichannel messaging solutions. While MessageBird specializes in seamless API integrations, live chat, and customer engagement across channels like WhatsApp, SMS, and voice, MSG91 stands out with advanced automation, template management, and scalable multichannel communicationâ€”ideal for businesses seeking data-driven engagement.

content.name: MSG91
content.des: MSG91 offers a comprehensive WhatsApp and omnichannel automation suite with features like payments, carousel templates, AI-driven chatbots, and automated opt-out management. Its advanced template management and dynamic segmentation make it ideal for businesses seeking scalable, compliant, and data-driven customer engagement.

content.name: MessageBird
content.des: MessageBird provides a unified platform for omnichannel messaging, including WhatsApp, SMS, email, and voice. It features a built-in dashboard for WhatsApp template management, AI chatbot creation, and seamless integrations, making it suitable for businesses looking for flexible API-driven communication.

features.whatsapp_pricing: Costlier, Added margin on Meta pricing
features.whatsapp_template_creation: MessageBird provides a built-in dashboard to create and manage WhatsApp message templates.
features.multi_agent_support: MessageBird charges $30 per seat after 2 free seats.
features.other_channel_support: Email, SMS, WhatsApp, Voice and more.
features.whatsapp_ai_chatbot_integration: Supports AI chatbot creation via Flow Builder with AI Actions.
features.unlimited_whatsapp_bot_creation: MessageBird charges a monthly fee of $10 per active chatbot.
features.whatsapp_payments: MessageBird do not support direct payment integration.
features.whatsapp_carousels: Supports creating and sending WhatsApp carousel templates.
features.whatsapp_catalogs: Create and share the product catalog.
features.integration_and_plugins_whatsapp: Integrates with multiple platforms like Salesforce, HubSpot, and Shopify.
features.otp_verification_whatsapp: WhatsApp (via templates), SMS, Email, and Voice.
features.unified_platform: Unified marketing dashboard with Segmentation, AI automation, and omnichannel campaign tools.
features.customer_support_quality: MessageBird offers limited email support on the free plan; 24/7 priority support via phone, WhatsApp, and email is available with paid support plans.
features.meta_ads_trackings_conversion: Offers Meta Ads tracking and analytics via a unified dashboard.

PreFooterComp.content: Start building your ideal customer engagement experience
